title: Apropos
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. One of the only places in town that offers vegan food (labeled): a couple vegan soups, a salad, jacket potato, 3 kinds of pasta, and a burger. And there are around 10 vegetarian plates. Some items are made in-house such as the pesto, bread, and salad dressing. Atmosphere is more like a pub with smoking allowed. Bar opens late into the night.
